revision.comment: /* Unresolved A-Class Review comments */ marking as {{Resolved}}
revision.text: {{GA|03:09, 16 August 2014 (UTC)|topic=Engineering and technology|page=1|oldid=621440243}} {{WikiProject Australian Roads|state=WA|class=A|importance=high|needs-map=no|needs-rjl=no}} {{WikiProject Australia|class=A|importance=Mid|WA=yes|WA-importance=Mid}} {{dyktalk|6 September|2014|entry= ... that '''[[Great Northern Highway]]''' is the longest highway in Australia?}} {{Article history | action1 = GAN | action1date = 16 August 2014 | action1link = Talk:Great Northern Highway/GA1 | action1result = listed | action1oldid = 621440243 | action2 = WAR | action2date = 21 October 2015 | action2link = Wikipedia:WikiProject Highways/Assessment/A-Class Review/Great Northern Highway | action2result = approved | action2oldid = 685479394 | currentstatus = GA }} ==Untitled== Has the prose of a B-grade but no references. [[User talk:Orderinchaos78|Orderinchaos78]] 02:54, 24 January 2007 (UTC) :C-grade it is, then. [[User:TRS-80|TRS-80]] ([[User talk:TRS-80|talk]]) 18:53, 13 July 2008 (UTC) ==Sealed?== The [[Great Northern Highway#History|History]] section states (twice) that sealing of the Great Northern Highway marked the completion of sealing the entire national Highway 1 route. However the [[Highway 1 (Australia)|Highway 1]] page states that large sections are still unsealed, specifically mentioning Queensland. --[[User:Gth-au|Gth-au]] ([[User talk:Gth-au|talk]]) 22:33, 2 August 2009 (UTC) : It's a strange one. It did complete it, then they moved Highway 1. Specifically, it used to come along the Barkly Highway through Mt Isa and Cloncurry whereas now it takes a route much closer to the Gulf of Carpentaria. [[User talk:Orderinchaos|Orderinchaos]] 23:50, 2 August 2009 (UTC) == Start point == this needs to include that it started at Great Eastern Hwy, the section that is now referred to as "[http://goo.gl/maps/XEkWF Old Great Northern Hwy]" [[User:Gnangarra|Gnan]][[User_talk:Gnangarra|garra]] 05:17, 4 May 2013 (UTC) :Here's a ref showing GNH starting from GEH: :*{{cite news |url=http://nla.gov.au/nla.news-article49048310 |title=Plan To Control Traffic. |newspaper=[[Perth_Gazette|The West Australian (Perth, WA : 1879 - 1954)]] |location=Perth, WA |date=22 August 1952 |accessdate=30 October 2013 |page=20 |publisher=National Library of Australia}} : - [[User:Evad37|Evad37]] ([[User talk:Evad37|talk]]) 14:22, 29 October 2013 (UTC) {{Did you know nominations/Great Northern Highway}} == Perth–Darwin == The lead section includes "Perth–Darwin National Highway", but the rest of the article has "Perth Darwin" without the dash. It should probably be the same throughout. [[User:Mitch Ames|Mitch Ames]] ([[User talk:Mitch Ames|talk]]) 06:34, 6 June 2015 (UTC) :{{Done}}, dash removed from lead. - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 02:45, 7 June 2015 (UTC) == Unresolved A-Class Review comments == {{Resolved}} I'm copying the yet to be resolved comments from [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Highways/Assessment/A-Class Review/Great Northern Highway|the ACR]] here as a worklist, so it's easy to find and I don't forget about them. - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 00:40, 6 November 2015 (UTC) ;History *The Midland Junction Municipal Council - run-on sentence **Split into into two sentences - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 09:02, 17 January 2016 (UTC) *"with the sealed road ending just past the Wheatbelt town of Miling in 1950." - Do we know how the sealed road got there? (There may not be info on this, but I thought I would ask) **Added an explanatory note which gives a little bit of info - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 08:57, 17 January 2016 (UTC) ***Not sure if 1928/29 is formatted properly per MOSNUM - could you check? --'''[[User:Rschen7754|Rs]][[User talk:Rschen7754|chen]][[Special:Contributions/Rschen7754|7754]]''' 17:39, 17 January 2016 (UTC) ****Its in the [[WP:DATERANGE]] section of MOSNUM: " The slash notation (2005/06) may be used to signify a fiscal year or other special period, if that convention is used in reliable sources." - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 22:20, 17 January 2016 (UTC) *rather than the historical but slow cattle drives - not following why "historical" is mentioned here. **Not really relevant - removed - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 28 December 2015 (UTC) *However, the resources allocated to Great Northern Highway were needed just - don't need "just" **Removed - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 28 December 2015 (UTC) *Same with "even just" later on **Removed - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 28 December 2015 (UTC) *"Newman was reached" - passive voice i **Adjusted - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 28 December 2015 (UTC) *eleven route corridors were investigated - by who? **Added - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 28 December 2015 (UTC) *$2.5 billion - there should be a nbsp here (and in similar places) **Fixed this one, and a couple of others that I had missed - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 13:13, 16 December 2015 (UTC) *Take a look at MOSNUM - I'm seeing some inconsistencies where you spell out the number versus where you use the numerals. **I've made some adjustments per MOS:NUMERAL - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 23:27, 14 December 2015 (UTC) ;Future *Is the first paragraph still up to date? **This does need to be rewritten - there's now a Muchea to Wubin Stage 2 Upgrade project, and I'll have to check if there's other updates to include - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 23:27, 14 December 2015 (UTC) ***Updated, but may need some copyedits - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 17 January 2016 (UTC) This completes the review. --'''[[User:Rschen7754|Rs]][[User talk:Rschen7754|chen]][[Special:Contributions/Rschen7754|7754]]''' 21:42, 17 October 2015 (UTC) :{{ping|Rschen7754}} Can you take another look when you get the chance? Cheers, - '''[[User:Evad37|Evad]]''37''''' [[[d:w:User talk:Evad37|talk]]] 10:05, 17 January 2016 (UTC) ::I didn't have any issues except for the one noted above. --'''[[User:Rschen7754|Rs]][[User talk:Rschen7754|chen]][[Special:Contributions/Rschen7754|7754]]''' 17:39, 17 January 2016 (UTC)
